doc: Exit status should be 0, only if there are no errors
This is a follow up to https://github.com/FriendsOfPHP/PHP-CS-Fixer/issues/1041
Currently PHP-CS-Fixer returns 0 if `--dry-run` is not specified, even when some files were skipped due to syntax errors. Shouldn't it return a non-zero value when a file is skipped?
The fixer was expected to fix the file, but it could not be fixed. Isn't that an error condition?
